statements: SELECT * FROM encrypted_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM encrypted_data WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_data WHERE credit_card_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT address, name FROM encrypted_data WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT id, encrypted_data FROM encrypted_data WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT name, address FROM encrypted_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_data WHERE id >= 10 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, address FROM encrypted_data WHERE address LIKE 'New%' AND credit_card_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT MAX(id), COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM encrypted_data GROUP BY address HAVING total_records > 1;
SELECT id, SUBSTR(name, 1, 5) AS short_name FROM encrypted_data WHERE LENGTH(name) > 5 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, encrypted_customer_data FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT order_date, order_total FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM orders WHERE order_total > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders >= 5
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, data_type FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_type = 'credit-card';
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE id = 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_type = 'credit_card' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT u.username, s.data_type FROM users u JOIN sensitive_data s ON u.id = s.user_id WHERE u.id = 3;
SELECT a.user_id, a.action, u.username FROM access_logs a JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE a.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY a.timestamp DESC;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(a.id) AS num_actions FROM users u LEFT JOIN access_logs a ON u.id = a.user_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY num_actions DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE in_stock > 0 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 2 AND product_id = 1 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_amount >= 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 10;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE in_stock > 0 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;

SELECT orders.order_id, customers.customer_name, products.product_name, payments.payment_amount FROM orders INNER JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id INNER JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id INNER JOIN payments ON orders.order_id = payments.order_id WHERE payments.payment_amount > 100;

SELECT * FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE customers.customer_phone LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, delivery_status FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY shipment_date ASC;
